text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump By “whole of America” are you referring to him shirking all responsibility and blaming the states? Stealing PPE shipments from the states? Refusing to help the USPS? Trying to blame Obama for no Covid-19 tests, even though it didn’t exist when he was president? The list goes on.
